item.title: A Dynamic Patching Policy for Enterprise Information Systems
item.description: The present research proposes a novel dynamic patching policy (DPP) to minimize the total system cost.

item.title: Enabling Ultra-Fast Online Order Fulfillment: Efficient Inventory Management for Micro-Fulfillment Centers
item.description: In this paper, we propose an effective threshold-based policy to help retailers make well-informed decisions, by formulating the MFC inventory decision problem as a Markov decision process.

item.title: 博弈论与多智能体强化学习（MARL）术语对比
item.description: 本文整理了一份详细的术语对比表，帮助理解博弈论和多智能体强化学习在概念上的联系与区别。

item.title: Optimal Live Selling Strategies for Brands: The Role of Effort Costs
item.description: This study present an analytical model to identify the optimal live selling strategy for maximizing brand profits. Published in Information Technology and Management.

item.title: Enterprise Security Patch Management with Deep Reinforcement Learning
item.description: This study addresses the patching decision problem by proposing a novel deep reinforcement learning-based approach. Presented in ICIS 2024.

item.title: Location
item.description: Professor Dr von Igelfeld's mailing and office addresses at the Institute of Romance Philology.

item.title: Office Hours
item.description: Schedule and location for Professor Dr von Igelfeld's office hours.

item.title: List of Irregular Verbs Across Romance Languages
item.description: This dataset contains all irregular verbs in known Romance languages.

item.title: Lectures at the Villa of Reduced Circumstances
item.description: This graduate course presents classical results in Romance philology.

item.title: Portugese Irregular Verbs
item.description: This book discusses Portugese irregular verbs in great details.
